languages.text: Размеренная жизнь на борту корабля была нарушена, когда на четвертую вахту полета нижние палубы... сменили гравитацию. Ошеломленные обитатели затронутых секторов были разбужены тем, что их сорвало с положенных им мест и швырнуло на потолок. Зафиксированы многочисленные травмы и гибель среди состава. Затруднения в выполнении каждодневных обязанностей по причине смены гравитации продолжались до конца полета. При выходе из варпа притяжение вернулось в условно-принятую норму — событие, которое опять-таки сопровождалось многочисленными травмами и смертями.

The steady rhythm of life aboard the vessel was disrupted when, on the fourth watch of the voyage, the lower decks... had their gravity reversed. The stunned denizens of the afflicted sectors were woken up by being torn from their assigned beds and tossed onto the ceiling. Numerous injuries and fatalities were reported. The difficulties in performing regular duties due to the gravity reversal continued until the end of the journey. After the ship exited the warp, the gravity returned to the accepted norm, an event that once again was accompanied by deaths and injuries among the crew.
languages.original_text: Размеренная жизнь на борту корабля была нарушена, когда на четвертую вахту полета нижние палубы... сменили гравитацию. Ошеломленные обитатели затронутых секторов были разбужены тем, что их сорвало с положенных им мест и швырнуло на потолок. Зафиксированы многочисленные травмы и гибель среди состава. Затруднения в выполнении каждодневных обязанностей по причине смены гравитации продолжались до конца полета. При выходе из варпа притяжение вернулось в условно-принятую норму — событие, которое опять-таки сопровождалось многочисленными травмами и смертями.

traits.locale_text: The measured life aboard the vessel was disrupted when on the second day of the voyage the lower decks... had their gravity reversed. The stunned denizens of the afflicted sectors were woken up by being torn from their delegated beds and tossed onto the ceiling. Numerous injuries and fatalities were reported. The difficulties in performing regular duties due to the reversed gravity continued until the end of the journey. After the ship exited the warp, the gravity returned to conventional standard, an event that once again was accompanied by deaths and trauma among the crew.

The measured life aboard the vessel was disrupted when on the second day of the voyage the lower decks... had their gravity reversed. The stunned denizens of the afflicted sectors were woken up by being torn from their delegated beds and tossed onto the ceiling. Numerous injuries and fatalities were reported. The difficulties in performing regular duties due to the reversed gravity continued until the end of the journey. After the ship exited the warp, the gravity returned to conventional standard, an event that once again was accompanied by deaths and trauma among the crew.

The steady rhythm of life aboard the vessel was disrupted when, on the second day of the voyage, the lower decks... had their gravity reversed. The stunned denizens of the afflicted sectors were woken up by being torn from their assigned beds and tossed onto the ceiling. Numerous injuries and fatalities were reported. The difficulties in performing regular duties due to the gravity reversal continued until the end of the journey. After the ship exited the warp, the gravity returned to the accepted norm, an event that once again was accompanied by deaths and injuries among the crew.

The steady rhythm of life aboard the vessel was disrupted when, on the second day of the voyage, the lower decks... had their gravity reversed. The stunned denizens of the afflicted sectors were woken up by being torn from their assigned beds and tossed onto the ceiling. Numerous injuries and fatalities were reported. The difficulties in performing regular duties due to the gravity reversal continued until the end of the journey. After the ship exited the warp, the gravity returned to the accepted norm, an event that once again was accompanied by deaths and injuries among the crew.

The steady rhythm of life aboard the vessel was disrupted when, on the fourth watch of the voyage, the lower decks... had their gravity reversed. The stunned denizens of the afflicted sectors were woken up by being torn from their assigned beds and tossed onto the ceiling. Numerous injuries and fatalities were reported. The difficulties in performing regular duties due to the gravity reversal continued until the end of the journey. After the ship exited the warp, the gravity returned to the accepted norm, an event that once again was accompanied by deaths and injuries among the crew.

languages.text: 船上平稳的生活节奏被打乱了。在本次航行的第四次值班时，下层甲板……重力颠倒了。在那片受影响的区域里，不知所措的居民们从床上摔了下去，砸在了天花板上。报告称，这期事故造成多人受伤、死亡。由于重力逆转，日常事务的执行变得异常艰难。当舰船驶离亚空间之后，翻转的重力再次恢复正常，但也同样再次造成了船员伤亡。
languages.original_text: The steady rhythm of life aboard the vessel was disrupted when, on the fourth watch of the voyage, the lower decks... had their gravity reversed. The stunned denizens of the afflicted sectors were woken up by being torn from their assigned beds and tossed onto the ceiling. Numerous injuries and fatalities were reported. The difficulties in performing regular duties due to the gravity reversal continued until the end of the journey. After the ship exited the warp, the gravity returned to the accepted norm, an event that once again was accompanied by deaths and injuries among the crew.

traits.locale_text: 船上平稳的生活节奏被打乱了。在本次航行的第四次值班时，下层甲板……重力颠倒了。在那片受影响的区域里，不知所措的居民们从床上摔了下去，砸在了天花板上。报告称，这期事故造成多人受伤、死亡。由于重力逆转，日常事务的执行变得异常艰难。当舰船驶离亚空间之后，翻转的重力再次恢复正常，但也同样再次造成了船员伤亡。

languages.text: El ritmo constante de la vida en la nave se interrumpió cuando, en la cuarta guardia del viaje, se invirtió la gravedad en las cubiertas inferiores. Los habitantes de los sectores afectados se despertaron al ser arrancados de sus camas y lanzados al techo. Se registraron numerosos heridos y muertos. Las dificultades para realizar las tareas habituales debido a la inversión de la gravedad continuaron hasta el final del viaje. Una vez que la nave salió de la disformidad, la gravedad volvió a la normalidad, un acontecimiento que, una vez más, estuvo acompañado de muertes y lesiones entre la tripulación.
languages.original_text: The steady rhythm of life aboard the vessel was disrupted when, on the fourth watch of the voyage, the lower decks... had their gravity reversed. The stunned denizens of the afflicted sectors were woken up by being torn from their assigned beds and tossed onto the ceiling. Numerous injuries and fatalities were reported. The difficulties in performing regular duties due to the gravity reversal continued until the end of the journey. After the ship exited the warp, the gravity returned to the accepted norm, an event that once again was accompanied by deaths and injuries among the crew.

languages.text: 船上の生活が安定したリズムを刻むのをやめたその時、航海の4回目の当直時間、下位デッキで…重力が逆転した。被害に遭ったセクターで唖然としていた住民は、割り当てられたベッドから引き剥がされて、天井へ放り出され目を覚ます。多数の負傷者と死亡者が報告された。重力逆転による通常業務は困難で、その不便さは旅の終わりまで続くことに。船が<歪み>を抜けると、重力はいつもの状態に戻り、再びクルーから死傷者が出てしまった。
languages.original_text: The steady rhythm of life aboard the vessel was disrupted when, on the fourth watch of the voyage, the lower decks... had their gravity reversed. The stunned denizens of the afflicted sectors were woken up by being torn from their assigned beds and tossed onto the ceiling. Numerous injuries and fatalities were reported. The difficulties in performing regular duties due to the gravity reversal continued until the end of the journey. After the ship exited the warp, the gravity returned to the accepted norm, an event that once again was accompanied by deaths and injuries among the crew.

traits.locale_text: 船上の生活が安定したリズムを刻むのをやめたその時、航海の4回目の当直時間、下位デッキで…重力が逆転した。被害に遭ったセクターで唖然としていた住民は、割り当てられたベッドから引き剥がされて、天井へ放り出され目を覚ます。多数の負傷者と死亡者が報告された。重力逆転による通常業務は困難で、その不便さは旅の終わりまで続くことに。船が<歪み>を抜けると、重力はいつもの状態に戻り、再びクルーから死傷者が出てしまった。

languages.text: L'invariable routine de la vie à bord du navire est perturbée lorsque, pendant le quatrième quart, les ponts inférieurs... voient leur gravité s'inverser. Effarés, les occupants des secteurs touchés sont arrachés de leurs lits et projetés vers le plafond. On fait état de nombreuses victimes et blessés. L'accomplissement des tâches quotidiennes reste perturbé jusqu'à la fin du voyage. Après la sortie du Warp, la gravité revient à la normale, non sans avoir provoqué d'autres décès et blessures au sein de l'équipage.
languages.original_text: The steady rhythm of life aboard the vessel was disrupted when, on the fourth watch of the voyage, the lower decks... had their gravity reversed. The stunned denizens of the afflicted sectors were woken up by being torn from their assigned beds and tossed onto the ceiling. Numerous injuries and fatalities were reported. The difficulties in performing regular duties due to the gravity reversal continued until the end of the journey. After the ship exited the warp, the gravity returned to the accepted norm, an event that once again was accompanied by deaths and injuries among the crew.

Effarés, les occupants des secteurs touchés sont arrachés de leurs lits et projetés vers le plafond. On fait état de nombreuses victimes et blessés. L'accomplissement des tâches quotidiennes reste perturbé jusqu'à la fin du voyage. Après la sortie du Warp, la gravité revient à la normale, non sans avoir provoqué d'autres décès et blessures au sein de l'équipage.

languages.text: Der regelmäßige Rhythmus des Lebens an Bord des Schiffs wurde gestört, als sich während der vierten Wache der Reise auf den Unterdecks ... plötzlich die Schwerkraft umkehrte. Die geschockten Bewohner der betroffenen Sektoren wurden aus ihren Betten gerissen und an die Decke geschleudert. Es wurden mehrere Verletzungen und Todesfälle gemeldet. Bis zum Ende der Reise konnten die regulären Pflichten wegen der umgekehrten Schwerkraft nur unter größten Schwierigkeiten erfüllt werden. Als das Schiff den Warp verließ, kehrte auch die normale Schwerkraft wieder zurück, was erneut zu Verletzungen und Todesfällen führte.
